com.jameswu.creditcardinput
Class InputMainActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.jameswu.creditcardinput.InputMainActivity

public class InputMainActivity
extends Activity

InputMainActivity Activity to input credit card number, expiration date, and pin. The company logo is shown next to the card number.

Author:
jianmingwu
